column4: how can i make ubuntu use my nvidia adaaptor instead of the Intel one?

stop lightdm, X -configure, cp /root/xorg.conf.new /etc/X11/xorg.conf .. edit xorg.conf, possibly you can replace the intel keyword with nvidia-- dont forget to have nvidia driver installed (and use sudo as necessary)
(and of course once edited, you can start lightdm)
it's hype and geekness, but thats what i check/do/tinker to fix X11.. definitely not fun..
